name: Stormovik: The SU-25 Soviet Attack Fighter
name_original: Stormovik: The SU-25 Soviet Attack Fighter
description:
Stormovik: The SU-25 Soviet Attack Fighter is a simulation game developed by Electronic Arts. It was originally released in 1990. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Stormovik: The SU-25 Soviet Attack Fighter is available on PC.
